item.title: Use Grunt to push a Git tag
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I use tags in git to version my code and push changes to production. Tagging is fairly simple using the git cli, but Iâ€™ve made it even easier using a simple Grunt task.

item.title: How to fork your own repo in Github
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: While forking your own repo sounds like it should be fairly obvious, its definitely not.
